docs.lead_paragraph: “Heaven Is for Real” is a toddler’s account of dying (almost) and meeting Jesus (and a rainbow-colored horse). It’s also a runaway hit. Believe it or not.

headline.main: My Son Went to Heaven, and All I Got Was a No. 1 Best Seller
headline.print_headline: My Son Went to Heaven, and All I Got Was a No. 1 Best Seller

docs.abstract: Maud Newton Riff essay on runaway hit Heaven Is for Real, Christian toddler's account of his near-death experience meeting Jesus; believes the visions children have in such situations have much to do with what they already believe.
docs.snippet: “Heaven Is for Real” is a toddler’s account of dying (almost) and meeting Jesus (and a rainbow-colored horse). It’s also a runaway hit. Believe it or not.
